items.name: Polaric Devastation
explicitMods: 20% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
+33% to Fire Resistance
+34% to Cold Resistance
19% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
Left Ring slot: Cover Enemies in Ash for 5 seconds when you Ignite them
Right Ring slot: Cover Enemies in Frost for 5 seconds when you Freeze them
flavourText: Those that escaped the annihilating light
sank eternally into crushing darkness.

items.typeLine: Prepared Divine Life Flask of Allaying
explicitMods: 109% more Recovery if used while on Low Life

Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 14 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 14 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Cloak of Flame
explicitMods: +70% to Fire Resistance
70% increased Ignite Duration on Enemies
Reflects 100 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
40% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage
flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that create permanent auras around you, changing their reservation to a cost and making them temporary. Cannot support banner or stance skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 34% increased Aura effect
Supported Skills Cost +233 Mana

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Auras from Supported Skills have a base duration of 10.90 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that multiplies damage over time and increases skill effect duration of you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
You and nearby allies deal 20% more Damage over Time
You and nearby allies have 19% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 34% reduced Mana Cost

Gain an Inspiration Charge when you Spend Mana on Upfront
Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 800 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills deal 5% more Elemental Damage per Inspiration Charge
Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: The Scourge
implicitMods: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
explicitMods: Adds 46 to 117 Physical Damage
10% increased Attack Speed
Minions have 12% increased Attack Speed
Increases and Reductions to Minion Damage also affect you at 150% of their value
Minions deal 70% increased Damage if you've Hit Recently
flavourText: With increasing mastery over death
comes an increasing desire for it.

items.name: Maw of Mischief
explicitMods: Grants Level 20 Death Wish Skill
+65 to maximum Life
26% reduced Mana Cost of Minion Skills
Minions are Aggressive
flavourText: The line that divides hope and fear,
life and death, crowd and mob,
is as thin as a whisper.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies. Minions cannot gain Cruelty.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 24% more Damage with Hits
Cruelty has a Base Duration of 4 seconds
Hits from Supported Skills grant Cruelty
19% increased Effect of Cruelty granted by Supported Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: 20% chance to gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Magna Eclipsis
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Gems
Triggers Level 20 Elemental Aegis when Equipped
194% increased Armour
+66 to maximum Life
+90 to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield
flavourText: Lunaris crossed silently, shining and full,
Softly night left her, alone and forlorn.
Solaris rose to meet her, feeling her pull.
'Neath the midday sun, the night was reborn.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: This Gem gains 30% increased Experience
+2 to Level of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Stone Golem that grants you life regeneration. In addition to its melee attack, the Stone Golem uses a rolling charge and a powerful slam that can taunt enemies.
explicitMods: Maximum 1 Summoned Golem
40% increased Minion Maximum Life
Golems grant 110 Life Regenerated per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Winterheart
explicitMods: +21 to Dexterity
+59 to maximum Life
+75% to Cold Resistance
Cannot be Chilled
Regenerate 10% of Life per second while Frozen
flavourText: Those who dwell in the deep freeze
enjoy a special kind of madness.

items.name: Chimeric Lash
explicitMods: +57 to Strength
+42 to maximum Life
+36 to maximum Mana
+48% to Cold Resistance
5% increased Flask Charges gained

socketedItems.name: Whispering Stare
explicitMods: Adds 16 to 23 Fire Damage to Spells
+29 to maximum Mana
2 to 51 Added Spell Lightning Damage while wielding a Two Handed Weapon
11% increased Damage over Time while wielding a Two Handed Weapon
5% chance to gain Phasing for 4 seconds on Kill
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Berek's Respite
explicitMods: Adds 22 to 36 Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
28% increased Lightning Damage
+36 to maximum Mana
When you Kill a Shocked Enemy, inflict an equivalent Shock on each nearby Enemy
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy
flavourText: "With Flame licking at his heels
Berek berated the clouds
Until vengeful Storm spewed forth his rains
And Berek held on tight
As Fire screamed and steamed
And fled."
- Berek and the Untamed
